name: Backrooms Recovered Footage
description:
Footage is recovered of someone in a place too familiar but full of unknown.

Inspired and moderately based on The Backrooms series by Kane Pixels.  

3 Endings Game Length - 10 to 40 Minutes

Controls

[W][A][S][D]Move
[Shift]Sprint[Escape]Footage Menu[E]Interact[F]Flashlight[Scroll Wheel]Zoom
